name: Mace of Unending Life
tooltip:
Mace of Unending LifeLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Ornate Hilt, 2  Jasper Idols, 5 Crystal Scarabs and 5 Stone Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Ornate Hilt
- Jasper Idol x 2
- Crystal Scarab x 5
- Stone Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
